title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Participatory Implementation for Enhancing University E-Book Service Development Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Over 80% of participants can explain university e-book service operation procedures (selection-purchase-management-utilization)
Through team projects, learners propose two or more actionable improvement plans for e-book services
Demonstrating technical support/content management competencies by achieving 75+ points on formative assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
